alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:10AM EST until February 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Prolonged period of light to moderate snow expected. For today through tonight, 2 to 6 inches of snow expected. Locally higher amounts of 8 to 13 inches expected in the higher terrain west of Marquette. For Tuesday and Tuesday night, an additional 3 to 6 inches expected with locally higher amounts up to 8 inches in the higher terrain west of Marquette. * WHERE...Baraga and Marquette Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of difficult travel is expected with impacts to morning and evening commutes today through Wednesday morning. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
